entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 09:53 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: ENE 48 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:47 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 06:47 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
